mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.name_china AS "nameChina", a.name_english AS "nameEnglish", a.code_grades AS "codeGrades", a.price_id AS "sicmedRegisteredPrice.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
b.registered_fee AS "sicmedRegisteredPrice.registeredFee", b.clinics_fee AS "sicmedRegisteredPrice.clinicsFee", b.material_fee AS "sicmedRegisteredPrice.materialFee"
LEFT JOIN sicmed_registered_price b ON b.id = a.price_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_registered_type( id, name_china, name_english, code_grades, price_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{nameChina}, #{nameEnglish}, #{codeGrades}, #{sicmedRegisteredPrice.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_registered_type SET name_china = #{nameChina}, name_english = #{nameEnglish}, code_grades = #{codeGrades}, price_id = #{sicmedRegisteredPrice.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
